page.title: 01DEVORAN AREA - GAZETTEER
page.content: Our area is one of outstanding natural beauty. It is rural and composed largely of agricultural land,pleasant- ly wooded. It includes three villages, Devoran, Perranwell Station and Carnon Downs. The villages contain a mixture of picturesque cottages, neat terraces, detached houses in spacious grounds and new estates. There are several disused quarries from which the local building stone was once obtained. Part of the area, including the river was tin and copper mining country, of which substantial traces remain. A British Rail branch line bisects the area, as does the A39 from Truro to Falmouth. Cornwall Bus & Coachways serve the area, as do a Travelling Library and mobile Fish & Chip shop. {
